flex:plugins:build.description: Builds Flex plugin and creates a JavaScript and sourcemap bundle. This command needs to be invoked inside a plugin directory.

flex:plugins:create-configuration.description: Creates a Flex Plugin Configuration. This command needs to be invoked inside a plugin directory.

plugin.name: plugin
plugin.description: The plugin to install, formatted as pluginName@version. Use additional --plugin to provide other plugins to install

flex:plugins:create.description:
Creates a new Twilio Flex Plugin project

Arguments:
name	Name of your plugin. Needs to start with plugin-. This command needs to be invoked inside a plugin directory.

template.name: template
template.description: A URL to a template directory

accountSid.name: accountSid
accountSid.description: The Account SID for your Flex Project

yarn.name: yarn
yarn.description: Use yarn as your dependency manager

args.name: name
args.description:
Creates a new Twilio Flex Plugin project

Arguments:
name	Name of your plugin. Needs to start with plugin-

flex:plugins:deploy.description: Builds and deploys Flex plugin to Twilio Assets. This command needs to be invoked inside a plugin directory.

flex:plugins:release.description: Creates a Flex Plugin Release. This command needs to be invoked inside a plugin directory.

plugin.name: plugin
plugin.description: The plugin to install, formatted as pluginName@version. Use additional --plugin to provide other plugins to install

flex:plugins:remove.description: Removes the Flex plugin. This command needs to be invoked inside a plugin directory.

flex:plugins:start.description: Starts a dev-server to build the Flex plugin locally. If the --name flag is used at least once, the command does not need to be invoked in a plugin directory. Else, it does.

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the plugin(s) you would like to run, formatted as pluginName to run locally, or pluginName@remote to run remotely.

include-remote.name: include-remote
include-remote.description: Use this flag to include all remote plugins in your build.

flex:plugins:list:configurations.description: Lists the configurations on the account.

flex:plugins:list:plugin-versions.description: Lists the plugin versions on the account.

name.name: name
name.description: The plugin name to list its versions

flex:plugins:list:plugins.description: Lists the plugins on the account.

flex:plugins:list:releases.description: Lists the releases on the account.
